Class Prenotazione

java.lang.Object
model.Prenotazione
public class Prenotazione extends Object
Represents a booking for a classroom, encapsulating details such as classroom number, date, time slot, booker's name, and booking motivation. Validates the booking based on classroom type and time constraints.

  • Constructor Details

    • Prenotazione

      public Prenotazione(int nAula, LocalDate data, LocalTime inizio, LocalTime fine, String nome, String motivazione)
      Constructs a new Prenotazione instance with the specified booking details.

      Initializes the booking with the provided parameters, ensuring that null values for nome and motivazione are replaced with empty strings. The classroom type is determined based on the classroom number, and the booking is validated against specific rules for didactic classrooms (1-8 hours) and laboratories (2 or 4 hours).

      Parameters:
      nAula - The unique identifier number of the classroom to book.
      data - The date of the booking.
      inizio - The start time of the booking.
      fine - The end time of the booking.
      nome - The name of the person making the booking, or null for an empty string.
      motivazione - The reason or description for the booking, or null for an empty string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the booking data fails validation or no classroom is found for the given number.

  • Method Details

    • validateBooking

      private boolean validateBooking(int nAula, LocalDate data, LocalTime inizio, LocalTime fine)
      Validates the booking details based on classroom type and time constraints.
      Parameters:
      nAula - The classroom number.
      data - The date of the booking (unused in current validation but included for future checks).
      inizio - The start time of the booking.
      fine - The end time of the booking.
      Returns:
      true if the booking details are valid according to classroom-specific rules, false otherwise.

      Gets the name of the person making the booking.
      Returns:

    • getMotivazione

      public String getMotivazione()
      Gets the reason or description for the booking.
      Returns:
      The motivation for the booking, never null.

    • getAula

      public AulaInterface getAula()
      Retrieves the classroom associated with this booking.
      Returns:
      The AulaInterface object representing the classroom, or null if not found.

    • getDescrizione

      public String getDescrizione()
      Gets a simple description of the booking.
      Returns:
      A string combining the booker's name and motivation, separated by " - ".

    • getTipoAula

      public AulaInterface.TipoAula getTipoAula(int nAula)
      Determines the type of classroom based on the classroom number.
      Parameters:
      nAula - The classroom number to look up.
      Returns:
      The AulaInterface.TipoAula of the classroom.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no classroom is found for the given number.

    • getValidationErrorMessage

      public String getValidationErrorMessage()
      Generates an error message based on which validation rule failed.
      Returns:
      A string describing the specific validation error encountered.

      Converts the booking to a JSON string representation.
